item.title: It's been a long time :wave:
item.description: I decided after a break to come back to blogging on my free time ! Here’s what you can expect on this blog Tutorials (but don’t expect a lot); Security watch posts ; Mostly elements that I’ve learned or found interesting. Please be mindful that my publications are not : Endorsed by my employer. I’m doing this on my free time because I want to share stuff that I find interesting.
